Package com.group19.payrollGUI

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
com.group19.payrollGUI.Controller
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
Client class, creates GUI object to handle user interaction.
Author:
Sagnik Mukherjee, Michael Choe

      public Controller()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      A sort of "constructor" class for the Controller. Initializes all the Action Events and MouseClicked Events associated with MenuItems and Buttons.

    • enablePartTime

      private void enablePartTime()
      Handler to disable input areas not relevant to PartTime.

    • enableFullTime

      private void enableFullTime()
      Handler to disable input areas not relevant to FullTime.

    • enableManagement

      private void enableManagement()
      Handler to disable input areas not relevant to Management.

    • resetForm

      private void resetForm()
      Handler to reset form input.

    • appendText

      public void appendText​(java.lang.String addon)
      Appends messages to the TextArea.
      Parameters:
      addon - String literal to be appended to the TextArea.

    • exitProgram

      public void exitProgram()
      Allows an alternative way to the "X" in the window corner for exiting the GUI program.

    • handleImport

      public void handleImport()
      Handles the importing of a text file for use within GUI.

    • handleExport

      public void handleExport()
      Handles the exporting of company contents to a text file.

    • handleAdd

      private void handleAdd()
      Intermediate handler for Add Button Event.

    • gatherInput

      public void gatherInput()
      Driver method to process input and invoke GUI commands. Methods should be matched to buttons.

    • setInputs

      private void setInputs()
      Converts manual user input from textFields and radioButtons to a String[] for inputs, a data field of Controller().

    • setCommonInputs

      private void setCommonInputs​(java.lang.String typeStr, javafx.scene.control.TextField salary)
      Intermediate helper, processes textField/radioButton inputs for Part-time and Full-time. They basically share input fields, just two different forms of salaries (annual vs hourly).
      Parameters:
      typeStr - "P" or "F," for the type of employee to be added
      salary - TextField value for hourlyRate, or for annualSalary

    • dateFormat

      private java.lang.String dateFormat​(java.lang.String dateStr)
      Formats the date toString value returned by DatePicker Node. Converts string from YYYY-MM-DD to MM-DD-YYYY.
      Parameters:
      dateStr - String of date to be formatted
      Returns:
      formatted String value of date

    • addPartTime

      public void addPartTime()
      Helper method to execute "Add Part Time" client command.

    • addFullTime

      private void addFullTime()
      Helper method to execute "Add Full Time" client command.

    • addFullRole

      private void addFullRole()
      Helper method to execute "Add Full Time Management" client command.

    • removeEmployee

      private void removeEmployee()
      Helper method to execute "Remove" client command.

    • calculate

      private void calculate()
      Helper method to execute "Calculate" client command.

    • setHours

      private void setHours()
      Helper method to execute "Set" client command.

    • printAll

      private void printAll()
      Handles printAll onMouseClicked action.

    • printByDate

      private void printByDate()
      Handles printByDate onMouseClicked action.

    • printByDepartment

      private void printByDepartment()
      Handles printByDepartment onMouseClicked action.

    • inputBreakdown

      private Profile inputBreakdown​(java.lang.String[] inputs)
      Helper method to process input substrings, namely the common ones among the command-based helper methods. This code appears in five other methods and was very redundant, so refactoring as a private method proved to be necessary.

    • validateSharedInput

      private void validateSharedInput​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String dep, Date date) throws java.util.InputMismatchException
      Helper method to validate common input among command-based helpers.
      Parameters:
      name - String Employee name to be validated (last,first)
      dep - String of department code to be validated (CS, ECE, or IT)
      date - Date object to be validated, hiring date
      Throws:
      java.util.InputMismatchException

    • validateSalary

      private void validateSalary​(double pay) throws java.util.InputMismatchException
      Helper method to validate salary before adding a FullTime/Management.
      Parameters:
      pay - double salary amount to be validated (positive value)
      Throws:
      java.util.InputMismatchException

    • validatePayRate

      private void validatePayRate​(double pay) throws java.util.InputMismatchException
      Helper method to validate hourly pay rate before adding a PartTime.
      Parameters:
      pay - double payRate amount to be validated (positive value)
      Throws:
      java.util.InputMismatchException

    • validateCode

      private void validateCode​(int code) throws java.util.InputMismatchException
      Helper method to validate code before adding a Management.
      Parameters:
      code - double salary amount to be validated (1, 2, or 3)
      Throws:
      java.util.InputMismatchException

    • validateHours

      private void validateHours​(int hoursToSet) throws java.util.InputMismatchException
      Helper method to validate salary before adding a FullTime/Management.
      Parameters:
      hoursToSet - int hoursWorked to be validated (positive value)
      Throws:
      java.util.InputMismatchException

    • throwAlert

      public static void throwAlert​(java.lang.String exceptionMsg)
      Helper to open Alert Dialog box when exception occurs.
      Parameters:
      exceptionMsg - String literal containing exception details
